name: The average of string!
description:
Random story:

Someday someone called Bishoy ask in him-self what will happen if I take the average of my name and he found this "m".

What you will do:

Your code must take string (contain: alphabet(lowercase and uppercase), numbers, all symbols like:@,!,$,etc.) and return the average of each word in it.

Examples:

"Hello, how are you?" => "[ohg"
"I'm fine and you?" => "Jhfg"
"I'm good ,but who are you?" => "Jj^ohg"
Note:
• Remember that you will use ASCII table ,ok.
• If the average if float like this (32.7 , 64.3) Round it to the nearest whole number (33 , 64).
